activities.loc: JMB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James L Brown

records.addlTxt:
9:17 AM Defendant James L Brown appeared by video.  Attorney Christopher Wilhelm appeared by video for James L Brown. Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
COVERS 22CF61, 22TR291 & 22TR296.
Attorney Wilhelm relates they are working on a resolution.  State relates.  Plea/status date set for all files in front of Judge Bitney for 01/10/2023 at 3:30 p.m. for 1 hour.  If a plea then must appear in person and if a status then parties may appear by zoom.  Address confirmed in 22CF61 and phone number updated.  Bond continues.

Plea hearing scheduled for January 10, 2023 at 03:30 pm.
Status hearing on November 2, 2022 at 09:15 am.

9:58 AM  Defendant James L Brown in court.  Attorney Christopher Wilhelm in court for James L Brown.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

COVERS 22CF61, 22TR291 & 22TR296

Attorney Wilhelm would like a reset.
Status conference scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

11:29 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant James L Brown appeared by video.  Attorney Christopher Wilhelm appeared by video for James L Brown. 
THIS COVERS 22CF61, 22TR291, and 22TR296. Formal reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered.
Status hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Arraignment on June 24, 2022 at 11:00 am.
1 - Driving record copy.

9:54 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant James L Brown in court by Zoom video.  Attorney Christopher Wilhelm in court for James L Brown by Zoom video. 
COVERS 22CF61, 22TR291 & 22TR296. Preliminary hearing and Refusal hearing started late due to technical difficulties.
Attorney Wilhelm relates on refusal hearing and would have appeared in person instead.  Attorney Wilhelm requests just holding Preliminary Hearing today.  State does not object.  Court relates notice was not given on refusal hearing and will be reset. 
22CF61 - 9:57 a.m. Officer Matthew Schneider with BAPD appears by Zoom video, called and sworn, and direct by State.  Exhibit 1 - Copy of Defendant's driving record - Offered by State - Received by Court. 10:06 a.m. Cross by Attorney Wilhelm.  10:08 a.m. Court relates, finds probable cause, and binds over for trial.  Arraignment set and and it's to be a plea then it must be in person; otherwise by Zoom  Refusal Hearing for 22TR291 to be set on another date and time, but will set for Status on same date and time of Arraignment  for now, for both TR files.   Bond continues.
Arraignment scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on May 3, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 27, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
